SyncClipboard.json

{
    "Type" : "Text"
    "Clipboard" : "Content",
    "File":""
}

    "Clipboard": "hash, optional",

}

entry.title: FreyaHolmer/ShaderForge
entry.summary:
A Shader Editor for Unity

hey everyone~

I will occasionally update this repository with fixes and features! I'll mostly do compatibility updates for future versions of Unity whenever I need it. if you want older versions, consider pulling one of the older branches! I'll try to name branches helpfully. the oldest version of SF you can get is for Unity 5.x

also, please don't pressure me into doing or fixing things because holy heck I was burnt out at the end of Shader Forge's first lifetime ğŸ‘€ I'm mostly working on this casually, either when I need a fix or a new feature, or when I have time to fix something other people really want to see fixed!

also, if you enjoy or are currently enjoying or finding Shader Forge useful, please consider supporting me, if you're able to!

you can either do a one-time donation on PayPal at https://www.paypal.me/acegikmo âœ¨

or a monthly donation on Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/acegikmo ğŸ’–

support is entirely optional though, I intend to keep this project open and free, but if you do donate, thank you so hecking much!! if you want to reach me, Twitter is the best place https://twitter.com/FreyaHolmer ğŸ¦

~ Freya
